div.p: STELLERA, German Groundsel, in botany: A genus of plants belonging to the claſs of octandria, and order of monοgynia ; and in the natural ſyſtem arranged under the 31st order, V epreculae. There is no calyx. The corolla is quadrifid. The ſtamina are very ſhort. There is only one ſeed, which is black. The ſpecies are two in number, passerina and chamaejaſme.
